verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> there was a man <S%G444><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Nicodemus, <S%G3530><s%> a ruler <S%G758><s%> of the Jews; <S%G2453><s%>

this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Him by night, <S%G3571><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> that You have come <S%G2064><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> [as] a teacher; <S%G1320><s%> for no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> that You do <S%G4160><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is with him."

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> again, <S%G509><s%> he cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G3708><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> when he is old <S%G1088><s%>? He cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3361><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> time <S%G1208><s%> into his mother's womb <S%G2836><s%> and be born, <S%G1080><s%> can he?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> and the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> he cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
"That which is born <S%G1080><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and that which is born <S%G1080><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is spirit <S%G4151><s%>.
"Do not marvel <S%G2296><s%> that I said <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'You must <S%G1163><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> again. <S%G509><s%>'

" The wind <S%G4151><s%> blows <S%G4154><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it wishes <S%G2309><s%> and you hear <S%G191><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of it, but do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> it comes <S%G2064><s%> from and where <S%G4226><s%> it is going; <S%G5217><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> is everyone <S%G3956><s%> who is born <S%G1080><s%> of the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>"
Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> be?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Are you the teacher <S%G1320><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and do not understand <S%G1097><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%>?

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, we speak <S%G2980><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we know, <S%G3609><s%> and bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of that which <S%G3739><s%> we have seen; <S%G3708><s%> and you do not receive <S%G2983><s%> our witness. <S%G3141><s%>

"If <S%G1487><s%> I told <S%G3004><s%> you earthly <S%G1919><s%> things <S%G1919><s%> and you do not believe, <S%G4100><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall you believe <S%G4100><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you heavenly <S%G2032><s%> things <S%G2032><s%>?

"And no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> has ascended <S%G305><s%> into heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but He who descended <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> [even] the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man. <S%G444><s%>

"And as Moses <S%G3475><s%> lifted <S%G5312><s%> up the serpent <S%G3789><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> be lifted <S%G5312><s%> up;
that whoever <S%G3956><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> may in Him have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

"For God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> that He gave <S%G1325><s%> His only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> that whoever <S%G3956><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> in Him should not perish, <S%G622><s%> but have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

"For God <S%G2316><s%> did not send <S%G649><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> into the world <S%G2889><s%> to judge <S%G2919><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> but that the world <S%G2889><s%> should be saved <S%G4982><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Him.

"He who believes <S%G4100><s%> in Him is not judged; <S%G2919><s%> he who does not believe <S%G4100><s%> has been judged <S%G2919><s%> already, <S%G2235><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he has not believed <S%G4100><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

"And this <S%G3778><s%> is the judgment, <S%G2920><s%> that the light <S%G5457><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> into the world, <S%G2889><s%> and men <S%G444><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the darkness <S%G4655><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> the light; <S%G5457><s%> for their deeds <S%G2041><s%> were evil. <S%G4190><s%>

"For everyone <S%G3956><s%> who does <S%G4238><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> hates <S%G3404><s%> the light, <S%G5457><s%> and does not come <S%G2064><s%> to the light, <S%G5457><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> his deeds <S%G2041><s%> should be exposed. <S%G1651><s%>

"But he who practices <S%G4160><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to the light, <S%G5457><s%> that his deeds <S%G2041><s%> may be manifested <S%G5319><s%> as having been <S%G1510><s%> wrought <S%G2038><s%> in God. <S%G2316><s%>"

After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and His disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into the land <S%G1093><s%> of Judea, <S%G2453><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> He was spending <S%G1304><s%> time <S%G1304><s%> with them and baptizing. <S%G907><s%>

And John <S%G2491><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was baptizing <S%G907><s%> in Aenon <S%G137><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> Salim, <S%G4530><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> there was much <S%G4183><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> there; <S%G1563><s%> and they were coming <S%G3854><s%> and were being baptized. <S%G907><s%>
For John <S%G2491><s%> had not yet <S%G3768><s%> been <S%G1510><s%> thrown <S%G906><s%> into prison. <S%G5438><s%>
There arose <S%G1096><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> a discussion <S%G2214><s%> on the part of John's disciples <S%G3101><s%> with a Jew <S%G2453><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> purification. <S%G2512><s%>

And they came <S%G2064><s%> to John <S%G2491><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> He who <S%G3739><s%> was with you beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> you have borne <S%G3140><s%> witness, <S%G3140><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> He is baptizing, <S%G907><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> are coming <S%G2064><s%> to Him."

John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "A man <S%G444><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> nothing, <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> it has been <S%G1510><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> him from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"You yourselves <S%G846><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> me witness, <S%G3140><s%> that I said, <S%G3004><s%> 'I am <S%G1510><s%> not the Christ, <S%G5547><s%>' but, 'I have been <S%G1510><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> Him.'

"He who has <S%G2192><s%> the bride <S%G3565><s%> is the bridegroom; <S%G3566><s%> but the friend <S%G5384><s%> of the bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%> who stands <S%G2476><s%> and hears <S%G191><s%> him, rejoices <S%G5463><s%> greatly <S%G5479><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the bridegroom's voice. <S%G5456><s%> And so <S%G3767><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> of mine <S%G1699><s%> has been made <S%G4137><s%> full. <S%G4137><s%>
"He must <S%G1163><s%> increase, <S%G837><s%> but I must decrease. <S%G1642><s%>

"He who comes <S%G2064><s%> from above <S%G509><s%> is above <S%G1883><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> he who is of the earth <S%G1093><s%> is from the earth <S%G1093><s%> and speaks <S%G2980><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%> He who comes <S%G2064><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> is above <S%G1883><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%>

"What <S%G3739><s%> He has seen <S%G3708><s%> and heard, <S%G191><s%> of that He bears <S%G3140><s%> witness; <S%G3140><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> His witness. <S%G3141><s%>
"He who has received <S%G2983><s%> His witness <S%G3141><s%> has set <S%G4972><s%> his seal <S%G4972><s%> to [this,] that God <S%G2316><s%> is true. <S%G227><s%>

"For He whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> for He gives <S%G1325><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> without <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1537><s%> measure. <S%G3358><s%>
"The Father <S%G3962><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and has given <S%G1325><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> into His hand. <S%G5495><s%>

"He who believes <S%G4100><s%> in the Son <S%G5207><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> but he who does not obey <S%G544><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> shall not see <S%G3708><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> but the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> abides <S%G3306><s%> on him."
